title: Authorizes boards of education to contract with any city, town or village where school buildings are located for increased police protection on school grounds
summary: Authorizes boards of education to contract with any city, town or village where school buildings are located for increased police protection on school grounds.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         2769

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 20, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  M.  of  A.  CROUCH, FINCH, GIGLIO, OAKS -- read once and
         referred to the Committee on Education

       AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to powers and  duties  of
         boards of education

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Section 1709 of the education law is amended  by  adding  a
    2  new subdivision 43 to read as follows:
    3    43. TO CONTRACT WITH ANY CITY, TOWN OR VILLAGE WHERE ANY SCHOOL BUILD-
    4  ING  IS  LOCATED IN SUCH SCHOOL DISTRICT FOR INCREASED POLICE PROTECTION
    5  ON THE GROUNDS OF SUCH SCHOOL BUILDING.
    6    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.







        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD04739-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to powers and duties of boards of education
